Package game.environments

Class SummonSign

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
game.environments.SpawnableGround
game.environments.SummonSign
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, Interactable, Spawnable
public class SummonSign extends SpawnableGround implements Interactable
A class that inherits from SpawnableGround, in which it spawns the Allies/Invaders. Implements Interactable as they can be interacted with. Created by:
Version:
1.0
Author:
Po Han Tay Modified by:, Bryan Wong

  • Constructor Details

    • SummonSign

      public SummonSign()
      SummonSign Constructor. Calls parent class to set inherited data attributes. Sets the display character to '=', name to "SummonSign". Sets the spawning limit to the maximum integer value.

    • canActorEnter

      public boolean canActorEnter(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor actor)

      Overrides:
